fields.description: The length of the sepal (a small part of the flower beneath the petals in a flowering plant, usually green) in centimers
The width of the sepal in centimeters.
The length of the petal in centimeters.
The width of the petal in centimeters.
The species of the plant: Iris Setosa, Iris Virginica, or Iris Versicolor.

card.description: This is one of the most famous datasets used in machine learning research. It contains 50 examples of three different species of iris plant, used to determine the species of a plant based on different measurements.

context.potentialUses: Determine the species of an iris plant.
